评论详情: The skirt fit nicely and comfortably. I'm not sure I realized it was only "pleather" on the front side of the skirt and the backside was spandex. Still a nice garment.
I was concerned because of how few reviews this skirt had but decided to take a chance and was very pleased! It looks very nice and is comfortable.
It is an interesting design and others have provided positive comments every time it is worn
